meanings.sent1: After the rain stopped, she rewets the plants in the garden.
meanings.sent2: If you spill water on the table, just rewets the cloth and wipe it clean.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy rewets the ground after the sprinklers turn off.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm for gardening rewets the soil of his backyard.
meanings.sent5: The gentle drizzle rewets the dry earth, bringing life to the parched land.

meanings.sent1: The towel rewets quickly after being wrung out.
meanings.sent2: If you leave the clothes outside, they will rewets in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The sponge rewets itself as it absorbs more water.
meanings.sent4: The river rewets its banks after the heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent5: The desert rewets with rare showers, transforming into a temporary oasis.
